mapper.select: SELECT news_corp_relation.news_id AS newsId, news_corp_relation.corp_id AS companyId, news.title AS title, news_corp_relation.preview AS preview, GROUP_CONCAT(keyword.keyword) AS keywordList FROM news_corp_relation, news, keyword WHERE keyword.corp_id = news_corp_relation.corp_id AND news_corp_relation.news_id = news.news_id GROUP BY keyword.corp_id, news.news_id
